titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Cumberland Valley Athletic Club on the 48th anniversary of the running of the JFK 50-Mile Ultra-Marathon.
A resolution congratulating the Cumberland Valley Athletic Club on the 48th anniversary of the running of the JFK 50-Mile Ultra-Marathon.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.
Senate Committee on the Judiciary discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Commends the past, present, and future participants and organizers of the JFK 50-Mile Ultra-Marathon.
